```{r}
library(tidyverse)

# data files
file_mtcars <- "../data/mtcars_data.rds"
```

```{r}
ds <- read_rds(file_mtcars)
```

```{r}
ds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(group = cut_width(wt, 1)), varwidth = TRUE)
```

```{r}
ds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = as.factor(cyl))) + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")
```
